alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbia, east central Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Five Points, or over Lake City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
